channel.title: recording on FishLasers
channel.description: Recent content in recording on FishLasers

item.title: The Oxford Gargoyles: Christmas in L.A.
item.author: me@fishlasers.co.uk (Fish Lasers)
item.description:
This Christmas, I had the privilege of returning to record the Oxford Gargoyles - that recording is now out!

  • Soloist: Steph Garrett
  • Sound Engineer: Alva Orr
  • Arranger: Tom Lowen
  • Video Editor: Cormac Diamond

item.title: The Oxford Gargoyles: Billie Bossa Nova
item.author: me@fishlasers.co.uk (Fish Lasers)
item.description:
This summer, I had the privilege of recording for the Oxford Gargoyles - that recording is now up on Spotify!

  • Video: Phoebe Tealby-Watson
  • Sound: Alva Orr
  • Soloists: Bilge Nur Yilmaz (Tendertwin), Sebastian Thomas, Phoebe Tealby-Watson, Hannah Blundell
